session.title: Badminton Session
session.configureYourSessionSettingsBelow: Configure your session settings below to create the perfect badminton experience
session.sessionNameDescription: Choose a descriptive name for your session
session.endTimeMustBeAfterStartTime: End time must be after start time
session.enableToGatherPlayerDetails: Enable to gather player details when they join
session.addOrRemoveCourtsToCustomize: Add or remove courts to customize your session
session.optimalCourtRotation: Set up court rotation every 15-20 minutes for optimal game flow
session.sessionDurationTip: 2-3 hours is ideal for most recreational badminton sessions
session.playerInfoHelps: Player information helps with skill-based matching and communication

validation.sessionNameMinLength: Session name must be at least 3 characters
validation.sessionCodeMinLength: Session code must be at least 4 characters
validation.maxPlayersMin: Must be at least 2 players per court
validation.courtNumberMin: Court number must be at least 1
validation.atLeastOneCourt: At least one court is required
validation.allCourtsMustHaveValidNumber: All courts must have a valid court number (â‰¥ 1)
validation.loadSessionFailed: An error occurred while loading session data
validation.tryAgainOrContactSupport: Please try again or contact support if the problem persists.
validation.sessionNotFoundDescription: The session you're looking for might have been deleted or doesn't exist.

session.youCanSkipAndAddLater: You can skip this step and add players later.
session.noPlayersAdded: No players added yet. Click 'Add Player' to get started.

home.title: Badminton Session Manager
home.description: Manage your badminton sessions, track player rotation, and optimize court usage
home.sectionDescription: Our intuitive platform helps you organize badminton sessions with ease. Easily track players, manage courts, and ensure everyone gets fair play time with our smart rotation system.

sessionManagement.title: Session Management
sessionManagement.description: Create and configure custom badminton sessions with flexible settings for courts, duration and player requirements

playerTracking.title: Player Tracking
playerTracking.description: Advanced tracking for player wait times, match history, and automated fair rotation system for all participants

sessionHistory.title: Session History
sessionHistory.description: Comprehensive statistics and session history with insights to improve future play organization and player experience

hosts.title: For Hosts
hosts.step1: Create a new session with your preferred settings
hosts.step2: Add players or let them join with their player number
hosts.step4: Manage court rotations and player assignments
hosts.step5: End the session to generate statistics

players.title: For Players
players.step1: Get your player number from the host
players.step2: Enter your number to join the session
players.step3: Fill in your information if required
players.step4: Follow the queue and court assignments

host.title: Host Session
host.description: Create and manage a badminton session

getCode.title: Get Session Code
getCode.description: Ask the host for the 6-digit session code

enterCode.title: Enter Code
enterCode.description: Enter the code in the field above

startPlaying.title: Start Playing
startPlaying.description: Join the session and start playing!

confirm.title: Confirm Details
confirm.subtitle: Complete Your Registration
confirm.description: Fill in your details to join {sessionName}
confirm.footer: This information will be visible to the session host

errors.requiredFields: Please fill in all required fields

status.statusDescription: Current status in the badminton session

waiting.title: Waiting to Play
waiting.description: You are in the waiting queue

court.title: Court {number}
court.playerHighlight: You are highlighted in yellow on the court above

status.footer: Please keep this page open to maintain your place in the queue

errors.missingPlayerIdDescription: No player ID was provided in the URL. Please join a session first.
errors.generalErrorDescription: There was an error loading your player information. Please try again.
errors.playerNotFoundDescription: We couldn't find your player information. You may need to rejoin the session.
